text: @TexasTribune @GovAbbott Over 5,100 new virus cases today in Tx. 7-day moving average jumps to 4,038. @GregAbbott_TX is a failure and a fool. 🤦🏻‍♂️ He put appeasement of DT before Texans’ health & safety. #GregAbbott #TexasCOVID #Texas #COVID19 https://t.co/qkd1BQrSrn
